Html:
Hello,

I develop an Windows 8 App with Prism Store Apps. I would like to bind the Page Loaded Event to my ViewModel, but i don't find a way for that.
I only found Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity. This is for Windows Phone as far as i know.

Can anyone help me about that?

Peter

Hi PeterHomburg,

This Prism forum is targeted to WPF, Silverlight and Phone applications.
You can find the forum of the Prism version for Windows Store Apps in the following link:

  • http://prismwindowsruntime.codeplex.com/
I believe you could find a more useful answer regarding your question in the aforementioned forum.

Regards,

Gabriel Ostrowsky
http://blogs.southworks.net/gostrowsky
